name: Silence + quicken is it a bad idea?
author: Arkanis Gath

posts.author: Arkanis Gath
posts.content:
As the title implies, I wonder if that's a good idea.
Quickened spells occupy spell slots four levels higher than normal. Consequentially Silence can be casted as 6th lvl spell, bypassing completely every globe.
Now immagine it with autosilence. 
Is there any build out there that i missed?
Thanks for the attention

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
I'm pretty sure that NWN doesn't count Quickened Silence as a 6th level spell - though it should
Spells modified by a metamagic feat use a spell slot higher than normal. This does not change the level of the spell, so the difficulty class for saving throws against it does not go up.

Effects of metamagic feats on a spell: In all ways, a metamagic spell operates at its original spell level, even though it is prepared and cast as a higher-level spell. Saving throw modifications are not changed unless stated otherwise in the feat description.
- https://nwn.fandom.com/wiki/Metamagic

Probably an Engine limitation.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
They do have one important use (though that is mostly for PvP and Dev side only) - and that is to make it almost impossible to Counterspell one's spells.

And believe me, if the Devs of a Mod or PW have NOT done any work to prevent/counter Player Counterspelling, then ANY and all spellcasting Bosses will get absolutely wrecked by a Sorc (or specially prepared other spellcaster) in Counterspell mode.

posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content:
- What's the counterspell for maximized I'sGMS casted after hasted Mord with a high level caster, with some Time stop between the missiles ?
.
.
.
.
- Resurrection.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Wrong.

You just click on Counterspell (radial, or, like me, use a programmable key) while being perma-hasted (cannot be Morded off).  And all the IGMSs will be Counterspelled, as will the Mords...so will the Timestop.  Just make sure you have enough Dispels (sorc is great for this).

The only thing that puts a damper on this is if the opponent is auto-quickened and perma-hasted, because to Counterspell it, one also has to be auto-quickened and perma-hasted. (note that one doesn't absolutely need to be perma- just hasted).
